00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include "midas.h"
00024 #include "msystem.h"
00025 #include "mcstd.h"
00026 
00027 int debug;
00028 
00029 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 
00031 INT cnaf16(DWORD cmd, DWORD b, DWORD c, DWORD n, DWORD a, DWORD f,
00032            WORD * pdata, DWORD * size, DWORD * x, DWORD * q)
00033 {
00034    INT i, count;
00035    WORD *ptmp;
00036 
00037    /* determine repeat count */
00038    count = *size / sizeof(WORD);        /* 16 bit */
00039 
00040    switch (cmd) {
00041     /*---- special commands ----*/
00042 
00043    case CNAF_INHIBIT_SET:
00044       cam_inhibit_set(c);
00045       break;
00046    case CNAF_INHIBIT_CLEAR:
00047       cam_inhibit_clear(c);
00048       break;
00049    case CNAF_CRATE_CLEAR:
00050       cam_crate_clear(c);
00051       break;
00052    case CNAF_CRATE_ZINIT:
00053       cam_crate_zinit(c);
00054       break;
00055 
00056    case CNAF_TEST:
00057       break;
00058 
00059     /*---- 16 bit ----*/
00060 
00061    case CNAF:
00062       for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00063          if (f < 16)
00064             cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, pdata, (int *) x, (int *) q);
00065          else
00066             cam16o_q(c, n, a, f, pdata[i], (int *) x, (int *) q);
00067       break;
00068 
00069    case CNAF_nQ:
00070       ptmp = pdata;
00071       if (f < 16)
00072          cam16i_rq(c, n, a, f, &ptmp, count);
00073 
00074       /* return reduced return size */
00075       *size = (int) ptmp - (int) pdata;
00076       break;
00077 
00078    default:
00079       printf("cnaf: Unknown command 0x%X\n", cmd);
00080    }
00081 
00082    if (debug)
00083       printf("cmd=%d c=%d n=%d a=%d f=%d d=%X x=%d q=%d\n", cmd, c, n, a, f, *pdata, *x,
00084              *q);
00085 
00086    return RPC_SUCCESS;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 
00091 INT cnaf24(DWORD cmd, DWORD b, DWORD c, DWORD n, DWORD a, DWORD f,
00092            DWORD * pdata, DWORD * size, DWORD * x, DWORD * q)
00093 {
00094    INT i, count;
00095    DWORD *ptmp;
00096 
00097    /* determine repeat count */
00098    count = *size / sizeof(DWORD);       /* 24 bit */
00099 
00100    switch (cmd) {
00101    case CNAF:
00102       for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00103          if (f < 16)
00104             cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, pdata, (int *) x, (int *) q);
00105          else
00106             cam24o_q(c, n, a, f, pdata[i], (int *) x, (int *) q);
00107       break;
00108 
00109    case CNAF_nQ:
00110       ptmp = pdata;
00111       if (f < 16)
00112          cam24i_rq(c, n, a, f, &ptmp, count);
00113 
00114       /* return reduced return size */
00115       *size = (int) ptmp - (int) pdata;
00116       break;
00117 
00118    default:
00119       printf("cnaf: Unknown command 0x%X\n", cmd);
00120    }
00121 
00122    if (debug)
00123       printf("cmd=%d c=%d n=%d a=%d f=%d d=%X x=%d q=%d\n", cmd, c, n, a, f, *pdata, *x,
00124              *q);
00125 
00126    return RPC_SUCCESS;
00127 }
00128 
00129 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130 
00131 INT rpc_dispatch(INT index, void *prpc_param[])
00132 {
00133    INT status;
00134 
00135    switch (index) {
00136    case RPC_CNAF16:
00137       status = cnaf16(CDWORD(0), CDWORD(1), CDWORD(2), CDWORD(3), CDWORD(4),
00138                       CDWORD(5), CPWORD(6), CPDWORD(7), CPDWORD(8), CPDWORD(9));
00139       break;
00140 
00141    case RPC_CNAF24:
00142       status = cnaf24(CDWORD(0), CDWORD(1), CDWORD(2), CDWORD(3), CDWORD(4),
00143                       CDWORD(5), CPDWORD(6), CPDWORD(7), CPDWORD(8), CPDWORD(9));
00144       break;
00145 
00146    default:
00147       cm_msg(MERROR, "rpc_dispatch", "received unrecognized command");
00148    }
00149 
00150    return status;
00151 }
00152 
00153 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00154 
00155 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00156 {
00157    INT status, port;
00158 
00159    port = 1750;
00160    status = rpc_register_server(ST_REMOTE, "", &port, NULL);
00161    if (status != RPC_SUCCESS) {
00162       printf("Cannot start server\n");
00163       return 1;
00164    }
00165    if (argc > 1) {
00166       debug = 1;
00167       printf("CAMAC server started (debugging mode)\n");
00168    } else {
00169       debug = 0;
00170       printf("CAMAC server started\n");
00171    }
00172 
00173    rpc_register_functions(rpc_get_internal_list(0), NULL);
00174    rpc_register_functions(rpc_get_internal_list(1), NULL);
00175    rpc_register_function(RPC_CNAF16, rpc_dispatch);
00176    rpc_register_function(RPC_CNAF24, rpc_dispatch);
00177 
00178    cam_init();
00179 
00180    while (cm_yield(1000) != RPC_SHUTDOWN);
00181 
00182    rpc_server_shutdown();
00183 
00184    return 0;
00185 }
